summary: Adds the armor of Jyggalags' Knights Of Order.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds the Knights Of Order's Crystal Armor to the world of Skyrim.

Anyone else play the Shivering Isles and love the armor that the Jyaggalags' knights wore? Well I did and wanted to add it to Skyrim and when I saw the Vicn Creature Resources I knew I finally could. All credit goes to Vicn:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37413/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D37413%26preview%3D&pUp=1

This mod requires Morrowind Armor For Skyrim which can be found here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22793/?
author: Skorm730
